| `showbody`     | `showbody`     | Show the Body Text? | `boolean` | `true`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `showcta`      | `showcta`      | Show the CTA Link?  | `boolean` | `true`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `showheadline` | `showheadline` | Show the Headline?  | `boolean` | `true`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
